explains: n. （Girth）人名；（英）格思；（法、德）吉尔特
wordGroup: girth weld 环形焊缝；周围电焊

sentences.en: A girl he knew had upset him by commenting on his increasing girth.
sentences.cn: 他认识的一个女孩对他不断增大的腰围说长道短，这让他很不高兴。

sentences.en: Bo met me at the front door in jeans and a white T-shirt over his ample girth.
sentences.cn: 博在前门与我见面，他穿着一条牛仔裤，一件白色的T恤衫遮住了他那肥胖的腰身。

sentences.en: Its technical expertise is available to provide laser, tyre, roller and girth gear.
sentences.cn: 其技术专长是提供激光、轮胎、辊和环齿轮。
